ISSUE.TITLE: Roxy Fileman unable to delete not image files
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.20+ if the storage of images in the database is enabled, then in the Roxy Fileman deleting files that are not images does not work, since such files are not saved in the database

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5819 Fixed problem on delete not image files in the Roxy Fileman
